                                soot.javaToJimple.IInitialResolver.Dependencies deps,
                                soot.SootClass sc)
        Checks the type of the given node and returns it
        Parameters:
        node - AST-node with a type
        deps - imports of the parsed class
        sc - current class, used for package and inner classes
        Returns:
        Jimple-type matching the type of the node
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError

      • getPackage

        public static java.lang.String getPackage(com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree.JCIdent node,
                                          soot.javaToJimple.IInitialResolver.Dependencies deps,
                                          soot.SootClass sc)
        Searches the imports for a package name matching the class type of the node
        Parameters:
        node - AST-node containing a class type
        deps - imports of the parsed class
        sc - current class, used for package and inner classes
        Returns:
        name of matching import-package
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError

      • isPackageName

        public static boolean isPackageName(com.sun.tools.javac.tree.JCTree.JCIdent node,
                                    soot.javaToJimple.IInitialResolver.Dependencies deps,
                                    soot.SootClass sc)
        Checks if the name in this node is a name of a class
        Parameters:
        node - node containing a variable or class name
        deps - imports of parsed class
        Returns:
        true if its a class name, else false

      • addPackageName

        public static java.lang.String addPackageName(java.lang.String className)
        Returns the complete name of a standard-package-class and adds it to the basic classes if necessary E.g. String -> java.lang.String
        Parameters:
        className - name of a class in a standard package
        Returns:
        name with package-name
